I just returned from an amazing trip to Italy, but wanted to pass on a couple quick tips about passport control in FCO.

If traveling with children 14 and under(our daughter is 11), you have to go through a different line then the other US citizens without children. The other line it looked like you just scan your passport at the machine and you’reआणखी out in 5 minutes. Not the case in our line. Our wait was over an hour in line.

We didn’t realize we needed to do passport control again and this time the line was only about 30 minutes. Not bad, but if we knew we needed to do this we would have walked down an hour earlier.
